title: Creating a team for Oceanic Open ladder
body:
Looking for a mid and Top laner

Requirements:
age 17+
Diamond min.
strong commitment
Open to criticism
vast champion pool
willing to learn new champs for the team
Skype/headset to communicate

to apply, reply to this thread with your:
Name and in game name
Age
Rank
Role/Champions you play
Days available
Other information (optional)

replies.body:
IGN: Daemon
Age: 21
Rank: Diamond 5
Role/Champions you play: Mid(Fizz, Xerath, Syndra, Azir, Akali, Ahri Talon Veigar Annie.. almost all of em.) Decent at support too, (Nami, Alistar, Janna, Sona)
Days available: Mon, Tues Wed Friday and Saturday
Other information (optional:) Uni student, on holiday at the moment, possibly have a fairly free schedule next year as well, but for the next few months I'm free as a bird. I'm a fairly good shotcaller in game

**IGN**: Plottel
**Age**: 19
**Rank**: Plat V
**Role/Champions you play**: Mid (BEST: Fizz/Syndra/Ahri/Kat/Diana/Orianna) - Pick up champs quickly and willing to learn any new champ as required by team
**Days available**: Mon-Fri 6pm-Late : Sat-Sun - All day
**Other information** (optional): I love eSports, have some competitive Starcraft 2 experience and would love to play League competitively. I have a good mindset and can both provide and take constructive criticism. Looking for like-minded players to develop together as a team

Yeah hi, I'd love to join. I'll tell you my name when the team meets. 
IGN: WQLFY
Age: 17
Role/Champs I play: Katarina, Vayne, Yi, Irelia, Malzahar, Orianna, Kha'zix, Rengar but can learn others on the spot and I have knowledge of every champs playstyle.
Rank: Gold 4, however I've played on numerous diamond ranked teams so I can easily adapt to strategies.
Days available: anytime

Although you say it's diamond min. I do believe that I can easily play well on any team. I'm open for criticism and commitment and I'm willing to do what it takes for the team to win.
ahh ok, i got friends that can't log on atm but im on atm, i'll send u a friend request from my smurf, casue i cbs logging into main
MAN BEAST. wont currently let me log onto league
Just wondering if firm on diamond minimum. I am PLat 3
